AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface. Note that HAPI dataset has a collection of parameters, each having the same time stamps..
AccessURL.x_Description: This CDAWeb dataset contains {n_keys} HAPI-type datasets. The @0, ... at the end of the ParameterKeys indicates the index of the CDAWeb dataset. (The dataset index <=> CDF file time variable pairs are {time_variable_names}.)
